description:
The 14-year-old middle school girl http://anidb.net/ch37381 [Sawada Honoka] has lost her parents at an early age, and finding friends at school does not come easily. Living at her aunt`s apartment, who is never at home due to work, Honoka wishes for her loneliness to end. Her wish is heard, and so the next morning she wakes up with a demon baby, http://anidb.net/ch37376 [Mao], in her bed.
Thus Honoka suddenly turns into a surrogate mother, but she is not left alone with this daunting task: the strict though dependable classmate http://anidb.net/ch37380 [Sugisaki Shin] helps out as "dad", and the Chibi Devil Nursery School with the accident-prone http://anidb.net/ch37379 [Enchou-sensei] and the kind http://anidb.net/ch37378 [Itou-sensei] take care of Mao during Honoka`s school days.
Honoka`s days of loneliness certainly seem to have ended...
— written by foo2
Note: The anime premiered as part of the Dai! Tensai Terebi-kun program on the public broadcaster NHK.

REGULAR.description: Honoka Sawada is a sad young girl who lost her parents and is constantly picked on by her classmates. One morning, she wakes up to find a strange baby with a devil`s tail named Mao. As Honoka is once again picked on by her classmates as she goes to buy some milk, Mao responds by blasting them with some fire.
Honoka calls her childhood friend, Kyou Toono, and his classmate, Shin Sugisaki, to see Mao. When Kyou leaves to watch his favourite anime, Mao escapes the apartment.
As Honoka and Shin search for Mao, Mao`s exploration ends him up on top of a roof. Mao is saved by a strange person who knows Mao-chan`s true nature.

The man reveals himself to be the director of a daycare for demon children such as Mao. When Honoka feels uneasy becoming about become Mao`s surrogate mother, she agrees to take care of him for a month while the director finds a replacement.

Mao becomes grouchy towards Honoka after being left at the daycare center for the first time, but Shin manages to set things straight. Afterwards, the director gives Honoka an invite to a welcoming party where she`ll meet the parents of other demon children.
Honoka meets some of the other parents and learns that demon children possesses abilities depending on what costume he wears, which they use to protect their parents.
Honoka becomes intimidated by Shin when he constantly scolds her for her clumsiness. Later that night, Mao comesdown with a fever.

titles.title: Papa and Mama are Having a Fight

REGULAR.description: Reading a book the Principal gave her, Honoka manages to stop Mao`s fever by letting him use magic. As Honoka and Shin make up, Honoka`s aunt, Rikako, comes home and becomes surprised when she see Mao.

titles.title: まおちゃん, ピンチ!?

REGULAR.description: With Shin`s help, Honoka manages to express her lonely feelings to Rikako.
Honoka attends a practice for a playdate with the other devil children mothers, Natsuki and Shiori, who don`t get along with each other.
Honoka tries to help everyone get along by encouraging the children to play together.
The day of the playdate comes and everyone finally manages to get along.
Mao spends the night without Honoka at the nursery.
Mao and friend take a test of courage while spending the night at the nursery.
Honoka`s time with Mao has come to an end. How will she deal with the loss?
Honoka and Shin get to meet Karin-chan`s father figure.

titles.title: まおちゃんの保育日記

REGULAR.description: Who makes Honoka`s heart go doki-doki?
Natsuki helps Honoka and Shin look for Mao-chan.

titles.title: ドキドキ公園デビュー
